name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lang translator for WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate WhatsApp, Telegram, and Discord messages with our extension. Just select text for instant translations in any language!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f:
Break language barriers on WhatsApp Web with our real-time message translation plugin. Seamlessly translate chat messages using multiple translation engines, intelligent scene language detection, and shortcut keys for instant input translation. Enhance communication with foreign friends effortlessly.

Features:

Supports multiple translation engines for flexible language options.
Intelligent recognition of context-specific languages.
Shortcut key support (e.g., Enter) for quick input translations.
Usage:
Set your preferred language and the language of your contact, and the extension will automatically translate incoming and outgoing messages in real-time.

Disclaimer:
WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc. This extension is an independent project and is not affiliated, authorized, or endorsed by WhatsApp Inc. or any official translation service providers.
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,pt_BR,pt_PT,:
Break language barriers on WhatsApp, Telegram and Discord with our real-time message translation plugin. Seamlessly translate chat messages using multiple translation engines, intelligent scene language detection, and shortcut keys for instant input translation. Enhance communication with foreign friends effortlessly.

Features:

Supports multiple translation engines for flexible language options.
Intelligent recognition of context-specific languages.
Shortcut key support (e.g., Enter) for quick input translations.
Usage:
Set your preferred language and the language of your contact, and the extension will automatically translate incoming and outgoing messages in real-time.

Disclaimer:
WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., Telegram is a trademark of Telegram Inc., Discord is a trademark of Discord Inc. This extension is an independent project and is not affiliated, authorized, or endorsed by WhatsApp, Telegram or Discord or any official translation service providers.
